code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import'../css/Footer.css';import chartSvg from'../images/piechart.svg';import calendarSvg from'../images/calender.svg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Footer=()=>{const{user,logout}=useContext(AuthContext);const[showPanel,setShowPanel]=useState(false);const togglePanel=()=>{setShowPanel(prevShowPanel=>!prevShowPanel);const panel=document.querySelector('.addSessionBackground');panel.classList.toggle('show');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"icons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>document.location.href='/chart',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(chartSvg,")")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>document.location.href='/calender',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(calendarSvg,")")}})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"addSession",onClick:()=>togglePanel(),children:" Add session"})]})})});};export default Footer;
